meanings.definition: A black, sticky substance used for surfacing roads or roofs.
meanings.sent1: The workers poured hot asphalt on the road to make it smooth.
meanings.sent2: The asphalt on the roof protects the house from rain.
meanings.sent3: The kids thought the asphalt looked like melted chocolate on the road.
meanings.sent4: Under the scorching sun, the asphalt shimmered like a dark mirror.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh asphalt filled the air as the road was being paved.

meanings.sent1: The construction workers will asphalt the driveway tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: They decided to asphalt the parking lot for smoother driving.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally asphalted my shoes while walking on the freshly paved road.
meanings.sent4: The team worked together to asphalt the entire stretch of the highway.
meanings.sent5: After the heavy rain, they had to asphalt the road again to fix the damage.
